column4: hey!  I have installed sims 3 on my laptop, which runs ubuntu 9.04, through playonlinux.  Installation was successful and game seems to start normally but I can only hear the sounds of the game, I am not seeing any video/image.  Plus at that point I am unable to swich to another app so I have to restart my lap.  Any ideas why I don't have video?  thanks in advance!
for the "i can't change of app", i don't think there is any workaround, but to go to TTY1 (ctrl+alt+F1) and kill the process
I'll try that tnx.. even though main prob is that I have no video.
yu can try to find some help on playonlinux.com
